location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'PLANS IN THE PERSIAN GULF. BAHREIN HARBOUR'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Printed on paper with manuscript additions in coloured inkDimensions: 465 x 470mm, on sheet 685 x 490mm

mods.abstract: A map indicating the locations of one buoy and one stone beacon in Bahrein Harbour in the Persian Gulf. The buoy and beacon are marked in manuscript with corresponding arrows drawn in the right margin.The base map on which the buoys are indicated is Admiralty chart 3380, 'Published at the Admiralty, 2nd. Octr. 1903'.A hand stamp on the verso reads, 'British India Steam Navigation Co. Ltd. Received 19 Aug. 1908'.
